query.statement:
SELECT CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_DESC, REG_DATE FROM XP_CATEGORY
#if ($SEARCH_CONDITION.length() > 0 && "0" == $SEARCH_CONDITION) WHERE CATEGORY_NAME like '%' || :SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%' #elseif ($SEARCH_CONDITION.length() > 0 && "1" == $SEARCH_CONDITION) WHERE CATEGORY_DESC like '%' || :SEARCH_KEYWORD || '%' #end
ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO XP_CATEGORY (CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_DESC, REG_DATE) VALUES ('CATEGORY-'|| NEXT VALUE FOR XP_CATEGORY_ID_SEQ, :CATEGORY_NAME, :CATEGORY_DESC, sysdate)
UPDATE XP_CATEGORY SET CATEGORY_NAME = :CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_DESC = :CATEGORY_DESC WHERE CATEGORY_ID = :CATEGORY_ID
